language.phrase: Upload a banner image from your computer or specify your advertisement HTML code(e.g. Google AdSense). If you choose to upload an image, it must be a valid GIF, JPG, JPEG or PNG file under 200kB.
Banner HTML must not be empty.
Banner Image must be a valid GIF, JPG, JPEG or PNG file under 200kB.
Block Assignment with the given name already exists.
Enter a name in this box which will create a block for your ad campaign. You can then drag this block into your required pages on the Layout editor.
Please provide a valid end date.
End date must not be before start end.
Date when campaign should end. Leaving it empty will run indefinite
Please provide a valid start date.
Date when campaign should start running. You could also set the date in the future
Here you can update your Ad Campaign information.
Here you can add new adblock.
Here you can manage your Ad Campaigns. Note: Deleting Ad Campaign will also delete all images and plugin assigned under the same adblock.
Total Clicks Allowed must be positive integer.
The campaign will end when this number of views is reached. Enter 0 for unlimited clicks.
Total Views Allowed must be positive integer.
The campaign will end when this number of views is reached. Enter 0 for unlimited views.
Minimum CTR must be numeric value between 0.0 and 1.0.

If you specify a minimum CTR (click-through ratio, which is the ration of clicks to views) and campaign's CTR goes below your limit, the campaign will end. If you decide to specify a minimum CTR limit, you should enter it as percentage of clicks to views (e.g. 0,05%). To create a campaign with no definite end, don't specify limits and your campaign will continue until you choose to end it.
The are no existing Ad Campaigns yet.
These are the user levels that will see the Ad. You must select as least one level.
